alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Concho; McCulloch (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 7:42PM CDT until May 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Coleman County in west central Texas... Northwestern McCulloch County in west central Texas... Northeastern Concho County in west central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stacy around 800 PM CDT. Voss around 805 PM CDT. Gouldbusk around 815 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Shields and Fisk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
